creator: rmeyer@hotmail.co.uk
text:
Created attachment 28837
Code changes for test case update to JUnit 4

The test cases in branch Temp_TrueTypePostScript needed to be brought in line with JUnit 4 in prearation for the branch merge.

creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
Patch applied in rev. 1343299:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1343299&view=rev

I also updated the FOPFontsTestSuite and RenderPSTestSuite to the JUnit 4 way of doing things.

And I added the DroidSansMono.ttf file, which strangely enough was missing in the repository.

Not the most exciting task, but a necessaryFOPFontsTestSuite. one. Thanks for your work, that was quite helpful.

Vincent
